structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

law.text: Upon request of the commission or local committee, facilities covered by those administrative regulations required in KRS 39E.210 shall, within the time periods prescribed by federal law, provide additional information necessary for developing and implementing the emergency plan about each substance to include, but not be limited to, material safety data sheets.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 79, effective July 15, 1998.
